update.name: JEM Package
update.changes: JEM 2.3.6 released on May 11 2023. First JEM version offering PHP8 compatibility. Please refer to the change log for details.; If you use template overrides please note that all views have been changed and there is a good chance that your overrides won't work as expected. So please check the changes and adapt your files.; Versions previous to 2.3.2 will not install correctly on Joomla 3.10.1!; This version of JEM is not yet compatible with Joomla!4. You will have to upgrade to JEM 4.x for that!

update.name: JEM Package
update.changes: JEM 2.3.6 released on May 11 2023. First JEM version offering PHP8 compatibility. Please refer to the change log for details.; If you use template overrides please note that all views have been changed and there is a good chance that your overrides won't work as expected. So please check the changes and adapt your files. Versions previous to 2.3.2 will not install correctly on Joomla 3.10.1!; This version not yet compatible with Joomla!4. You will have to upgrade to JEM 4.x for that!; Please update to Joomla 4/5 and JEM 4.x!

update.name: JEM Package
JEM Package
update.notes: JEM 5.0.0 for Joomla! 6.x. JEM for Joomla 6 is coming with version 5.x; If you are upgrading from JEM 2.x and Joomla 3 and use template overrides please note that all views have been changed and there is a good chance that your overrides won't work as expected.; So please check the changes and adapt your files.; For migration from JEM on Joomla 3.10.x, don't uninstall, only disable plugin and modules. Versions previous to 2.3.5 will not migrate correctly.
update.changes: JEM 5.0.0 was released on February 18, 2026; Support Joomla 6 with compatibility plugin and PHP 8.4; Please refer to the changelog for details.
